languages.text: Созданный из останков самых верных слуг Империума и технологий Адептус Механикус сакральный механизм, способный выполнять множество вспомогательных функций. Самые продвинутые сервочерепа обладают функцией, привязывающей рой к определенному хозяину. Все машинные духи такого роя служат одному избранному человеку.

Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.
languages.original_text: Созданный из останков самых верных слуг Империума и технологий Адептус Механикус сакральный механизм, способный выполнять множество вспомогательных функций. Самые продвинутые сервочерепа обладают функцией, привязывающей рой к определенному хозяину. Все машинные духи такого роя служат одному избранному человеку.

traits.locale_text: Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters assigning them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters assigning them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

languages.text: Diese aus den Überresten der treuesten Diener des Imperiums und den Technologien des Adeptus Mechanicus geschaffenen heiligen Mechanismen können gemeinsam eine Vielzahl von Hilfsfunktionen erfüllen. Die modernsten Servoschädel verfügen über Parameter, die sie einem spezifischen Meister zuordnen. Die Maschinengeister eines solchen Schwarms sind in dieses einzelne Individuum gebunden.
languages.original_text: Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

traits.locale_text: Diese aus den Überresten der treuesten Diener des Imperiums und den Technologien des Adeptus Mechanicus geschaffenen heiligen Mechanismen können gemeinsam eine Vielzahl von Hilfsfunktionen erfüllen. Die modernsten Servoschädel verfügen über Parameter, die sie einem spezifischen Meister zuordnen. Die Maschinengeister eines solchen Schwarms sind in dieses einzelne Individuum gebunden.

languages.text: Créés à partir des dépouilles des plus fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium et de la technologie de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, ces mécanismes sacrés sont capables de remplir diverses fonctions auxiliaires. Les servocrânes les plus avancés sont regroupés en essaims et dotés de paramètres les attribuant à un maître spécifique que leurs esprits de la machine servent loyalement.
languages.original_text: Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

traits.locale_text: Créés à partir des dépouilles des plus fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium et de la technologie de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, ces mécanismes sacrés sont capables de remplir diverses fonctions auxiliaires. Les servocrânes les plus avancés sont regroupés en essaims et dotés de paramètres les attribuant à un maître spécifique que leurs esprits de la machine servent loyalement.

languages.text: 这种神圣的机械装置，由整个帝国最忠诚仆人的遗骸制成。通过机械修会的技术，这些伺服头骨可以执行各种各样的辅助功能。最先进的伺服头骨所有参数都经过精心设置，用来为特定的帝国成员服务。伺服头骨集群的所有机魂都会为同一位主人效力。
languages.original_text: Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

traits.locale_text: 这种神圣的机械装置，由整个帝国最忠诚仆人的遗骸制成。通过机械修会的技术，这些伺服头骨可以执行各种各样的辅助功能。最先进的伺服头骨所有参数都经过精心设置，用来为特定的帝国成员服务。伺服头骨集群的所有机魂都会为同一位主人效力。

languages.text: Estos sagrados mecanismos, creados a partir de los restos de los sirvientes más fieles del Imperium con tecnología del Adeptus Mechanicus, pueden realizar diversas funciones auxiliares. Los servocráneos más avanzados cuentan con parámetros que los asignan a un amo concreto. Los espíritus máquina del enjambre quedan vinculados a su servicio.
languages.original_text: Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

traits.locale_text: Estos sagrados mecanismos, creados a partir de los restos de los sirvientes más fieles del Imperium con tecnología del Adeptus Mechanicus, pueden realizar diversas funciones auxiliares. Los servocráneos más avanzados cuentan con parámetros que los asignan a un amo concreto. Los espíritus máquina del enjambre quedan vinculados a su servicio.

languages.text: 帝国でもっとも忠実な奉仕者たちの遺骸と、帝国技術局の技術から作られたこれらの神聖な機械は、さまざまな補助的機能を果たすことができる。もっとも高度なサーヴォスカルには特定の主人に割り当てるための識別機能が搭載されており、その群れの機械精霊は、ただ一人の個人に仕えるよう義務づけられている。
languages.original_text: Created from the remains of the Imperium's most faithful servants and the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, these sacred mechanisms together can perform a variety of auxiliary functions. The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.

traits.locale_text: 帝国でもっとも忠実な奉仕者たちの遺骸と、帝国技術局の技術から作られたこれらの神聖な機械は、さまざまな補助的機能を果たすことができる。もっとも高度なサーヴォスカルには特定の主人に割り当てるための識別機能が搭載されており、その群れの機械精霊は、ただ一人の個人に仕えるよう義務づけられている。

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un en sadık hizmetkârlarının naaşlarından ve Adeptus Mechanicus teknolojilerinden üretilen bu kutsal mekanizmalar, bir araya gelerek pek çok yardımcı işlevi yerine getirebilir. Hizmeletlerin en gelişmişleri, onları belirli bir sahibe atayan parametrelerle donatılmıştır. Böyle bir sürünün makine ruhları, tek bir şahsa hizmet eder.

The most advanced servo-skulls are fitted with parameters that assign them to a specific master. The machine spirits of such a swarm are service-bound to that single individual.
